With Bold and Links

Live Example

This is an important callout with a link to Google and some italic text. You can also use inline code here.

Syntax

:::info
This is an **important** callout with a [link to Google](https://google.com) and some *italic text*. You can also use `inline code` here.
:::

Live Example

Success! Your changes have been saved. Visit our documentation for more information.

Syntax

:::success
**Success!** Your changes have been saved. Visit [our documentation](https://example.com/docs) for more information.
:::

With Complex Content (Lists & Multiple Paragraphs)

Live Example

This is a complex callout with multiple features:

  • First list item with italic text
  • Second item with a link
  • Third item with inline code

Here’s a second paragraph with more bold text.

And a third paragraph to test multiple paragraphs.

Syntax

:::info
This is a **complex** callout with multiple features:

- First list item with *italic* text
- Second item with [a link](https://example.com)
- Third item with `inline code`

Here's a second paragraph with more **bold text**.

And a third paragraph to test multiple paragraphs.
:::

Details

Basic

Live Example

Summary text

Details content

Syntax

^^^
Summary text
>>>
Details content
^^^

Filled

Live Example

Summary with filled style

Content

Syntax

^^^filled
Summary with filled style
>>>
Content
^^^

Plain

Live Example

Summary with plain style

Content

Syntax

^^^plain
Summary with plain style
>>>
Content
^^^

Filled + Outlined

Live Example

Summary with both styles

Content

Syntax

^^^filled-outlined
Summary with both styles
>>>
Content
^^^

With Extra Formatting

Live Example

Click here for important information

This details section contains bold text, a link to our docs, and italic text. You can also use inline code formatting.

  • And lists
  • With multiple items

Syntax

^^^
Click here for **important** information
>>>
This details section contains **bold text**, [a link to our docs](https://example.com), and *italic text*. You can also use `inline code` formatting.

- And lists
- With multiple items
^^^

Tab Groups

Default (Top)

Live Example

Tab 1Tab 2

Content for tab 1

Content for tab 2

Syntax

++++++
+++ Tab 1
Content for tab 1
+++

+++ Tab 2
Content for tab 2
+++
++++++

Bottom Placement

Live Example

Tab 1Tab 2

Content with tabs at bottom

More content for tab 2

Syntax

++++++bottom
+++ Tab 1
Content with tabs at bottom
+++

+++ Tab 2
More content for tab 2
+++
++++++

Start Placement (Left)

Live Example

Tab 1Tab 2

Content with tabs on left

More content for tab 2

Syntax

++++++start
+++ Tab 1
Content with tabs on left
+++

+++ Tab 2
More content for tab 2
+++
++++++

End Placement (Right)

Live Example

Tab 1Tab 2

Content with tabs on right

More content for tab 2

Syntax

++++++end
+++ Tab 1
Content with tabs on right
+++

+++ Tab 2
More content for tab 2
+++
++++++

With Bold and Links in Tabs

Live Example

**Quick Start***Advanced* Setup

Get started quickly with our installation guide. This tab contains bold text and italic formatting.

For advanced users, check out our advanced configuration docs. Use npm install to get started.

Syntax

++++++
+++ **Quick Start**
Get started quickly with our [installation guide](https://example.com/install). This tab contains **bold text** and *italic formatting*.
+++

+++ *Advanced* Setup
For advanced users, check out our [advanced configuration docs](https://example.com/advanced). Use `npm install` to get started.
+++
++++++

Cards with Rich Content

Live Example

Project Showcase

This card demonstrates rich content including bold text, italic text, inline code, and links.

Features include: - Responsive design - Accessible markup - Easy customization - Modern styling

Perfect for showcasing projects, features, or any structured content.

Code Blocks in Cards

Live Example

Installation Guide

Follow these steps to install the package:

Then add it to your _config.yml:

View Documentation

Syntax

bash npm install jekyll-webawesome bundle install


<p>Then add it to your <code>_config.yml</code>:</p>

<p><code>yaml
plugins:
  - jekyll-webawesome
</code></p>
<div slot="footer"><wa-button href="https://github.com/example/docs">View Documentation</wa-button></div></wa-card>
